commit message: 'Default' Activity to represent default screen to show on case close
Implemented HMAppWidgetManager to control adding of app widgets
Fixed activity lifecycle stuff - added comments and debug

Implemented default clock - fixed a couple of minor bugs with widget
logic

Added capability to show the default activity screen if the power button
is pressed while the case is closed

Added capability to get root permissions, and run commands change screen
sensitivity

Fixed issue with controls not working through screen - Handler replaced
with Timer
merge 0.0.2a into appwidgets

General tidy up - lots more comments and debug, fixed some issues around
the event handling

Couple more bug fixes / tweaks - fixed crash on re-entry to config
screen, changed calls to finish to moveToBack, and made config get out
the way on open_cover

preference improvements
- Configuration inherits from PreferenceActivity
- generic PreferenceFragmentLoader implemented (renamed ConfigurationFragment)
- backStack support implemented
- PreferenceSwitchable implemented (enables switchable PreferenceScreens. see preferences.xml)
- separation of preferences for different application parts (preferences.xml, preferences_phone.xml)
- preview for phone settings (a simple AlertDialog by now; configurable via xml see. preferences_phone.xml)
- debug on/off via about preference (7 times tapping to switch)
